title: Linear and rotational motion - linear speed disk

content.question: A horizontal disk is free to rotate about an axis through its center. Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>P</mtext></math> is located on the disk a distance <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> from the center. At time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the disk begins spinning from rest with constant angular acceleration. At time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, the disk has rotated through an angle <math alttext="theta sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the instantaneous linear speed of Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math> at time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction theta sub 1 over t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction x theta sub 1 over t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 theta sub 1 over t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 x theta sub 1 over t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 2 x theta sub 1 over t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>
